DOC.brief_summary: This is a single-blinded RCT evaluating the value of up-positioning of the testes as supportive therapy in patients receiving antimicrobial treatment due to acute bacterial orchitis.
DOC.brief_title: Up-positioning of the Testes as Supportive Therapy in Patients With Acute Orchitis
DOC.criteria: acute orchitis confirmed clinically and in scrotal ultrasound age >=18 yrs previous treatment of orchitis, need for exploration of the scrotum, need for hospitalization, physical and mental status not allowing for uppositioning of the testes during treatment
